mapper.select: SELECT ms.id, ms.match_status, ms.send_user_id, ms.receive_user_id, s_user.id AS user_id_send, s_user.user_name AS user_name_send, s_user.debut_dt AS user_debut_dt_send, r_user.id AS user_id_receive, r_user.user_name AS user_name_receive, r_user.debut_dt AS user_debut_dt_receive FROM match_status ms INNER JOIN user s_user ON ms.send_user_id = s_user.id AND s_user.delete_flg = 0 INNER JOIN user r_user ON ms.receive_user_id = r_user.id AND r_user.delete_flg = 0 WHERE (ms.send_user_id = #{userId} OR ms.receive_user_id = #{userId}) AND ms.match_status != 20 ORDER BY ms.create_at DESC

SELECT ms.id, ms.match_status, ms.send_user_id, ms.receive_user_id, s_user.id AS user_id_send, s_user.user_name AS user_name_send, s_user.debut_dt AS user_debut_dt_send, r_user.id AS user_id_receive, r_user.user_name AS user_name_receive, r_user.debut_dt AS user_debut_dt_receive FROM match_status ms INNER JOIN user s_user ON ms.send_user_id = s_user.id AND s_user.delete_flg = 0 INNER JOIN user r_user ON ms.receive_user_id = r_user.id AND r_user.delete_flg = 0 WHERE (ms.send_user_id = #{sendUserId} AND ms.receive_user_id = #{receiveUserId}) AND ms.match_status != 20
